snippet.title: VTOL VR - AH-94 Attack Helicopter DLC Trailer
snippet.description:
NOW AVAILABLE!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1770480/VTOL_VR_AH94_Attack_Helicopter/

The AH-94 is a two-seater attack helicopter DLC for VTOL VR.  Fly in singleplayer or with a copilot in online multiplayer. Learn the various weapons, sensors, and controls, practice the art of hovering, and start slinging rounds at targets of opportunity.

Requires the base game:
VTOL VR
https://store.steampowered.com/app/667970/VTOL_VR/
